titleStmt.title: The sounding of the last trumpet or, Several visions, declaring the universall overturning and rooting up of all earthly powers in England. With many other things foretold, which shall come to passe in this year, 1650. / Lately shewed unto George Foster, who was commanded to print them.
titleStmt.author: Foster, George.

titleStmt.title: The sounding of the last trumpet or, Several visions, declaring the universall overturning and rooting up of all earthly powers in England. With many other things foretold, which shall come to passe in this year, 1650. / Lately shewed unto George Foster, who was commanded to print them.
titleStmt.author: Foster, George.

notesStmt.note: In this edition line ornament consists of 6 large ornaments, 5 small ones, and the letter "S".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
